Symbol.Script_3D:
if show_el<1 then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen
if not(not(show_axis) and GLOB_CONTEXT=2) then call "2dmacro" parameters all, type_symb = type_symb if show_axis then hotspot 0,0,0 end endif ! --- TRANSFORMATION --- !
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
unID = 1 HOTSPOT prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
!!HOTSPOT prismHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 !!HOTSPOT -prismHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 !!HOTSPOT -prismHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 !!HOTSPOT prismHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT prismInsideHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -prismInsideHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -prismInsideHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT prismInsideHalfWidth, B, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, ConPosZ_1, unID: unID=unID+1
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN FOR i = 0 TO 0 ADDy i*(B+edgeThick) ROTx -90 ADDy -ConPosZ_1 PRISM_ 10, -edgeThick, prismHalfWidth, prismHalfHeight, 15, -prismHalfWidth, prismHalfHeight, 15, -prismHalfWidth, -prismHalfHeight, 15, prismHalfWidth, -prismHalfHeight, 15, prismHalfWidth, prismHalfHeight, -1,
prismInsideHalfWidth, prismInsideHalfHeight, 15, -prismInsideHalfWidth, prismInsideHalfHeight, 15, -prismInsideHalfWidth, -prismInsideHalfHeight, 15, prismInsideHalfWidth, -prismInsideHalfHeight, 15, prismInsideHalfWidth, prismInsideHalfHeight, -1 DEL 3 NEXT i
OD_Connection = prismInsideHalfWidth*2 OD2_Connection = prismInsideHalfHeight*2
ADDz ConPosZ_1 ROTx -90
db2=INT(OD2_Connection/0.2) IF db2 = 0 THEN db2 = 1 dist2=OD2_Connection/db2 FOR i=0 TO db2-1 ADDy -dist2*i ADDy OD2_Connection/2-(dist2-0.2)/2 ADDx -OD_Connection/2 PLANE 4, eps, 0, 0, OD_Connection-eps, 0, 0, OD_Connection-eps, -0.03, 0, eps, -0.03, 0
PLANE 4, eps, -0.03, 0, OD_Connection-eps, -0.03, 0, OD_Connection-eps, -0.2+0.03, B, eps, -0.2+0.03, B
PLANE 4, eps, -0.2+0.03, B, OD_Connection-eps, -0.2+0.03, B, OD_Connection-eps, -0.20, B, eps, -0.20, B DEL 3 NEXT i DEL 2 ELSE FOR i = 0 TO 0 ADDy i*(B+edgeThick) ROTx -90 ADDy -ConPosZ_1 PRISM_ 5, -edgeThick, prismHalfWidth, prismHalfHeight, 15, -prismHalfWidth, prismHalfHeight, 15, -prismHalfWidth, -prismHalfHeight, 15, prismHalfWidth, -prismHalfHeight, 15, prismHalfWidth, prismHalfHeight, -1 DEL 3 NEXT i ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1
DEL TOP
END
Symbol.Script_2D:
if show_el<1 then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m = 0 THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100
call "2dmacro" parameters all, type_symb = type_symb, dirAngOnXYPlane=dirAngOnXYPlane if show_axis then hotspot2 0,0 end endif
unID = 1 IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 dirAngOnXYPlane
HOTSPOT2 prismHalfWidth, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -prismHalfWidth, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
!! HOTSPOT2 prismHalfWidth, B, unID: unID=unID+1 !! HOTSPOT2 -prismHalfWidth, B, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 prismInsideHalfWidth, B, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -prismInsideHalfWidth, B, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
PUT -prismHalfWidth, 0, 1, prismHalfWidth, 0, 1, prismHalfWidth, -edgeThick, 1, -prismHalfWidth, -edgeThick, 1, -prismHalfWidth, 0, -1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, GET (NSP)
!! USE (NSP) !! !! ADD2 0, B+edgeThick !! POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, !! GET (NSP) !! DEL 1
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1 DEL 2 ELSE HOTSPOT2 outCoords[6][1], outCoords[6][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[7][1], outCoords[7][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[8][1], outCoords[8][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[9][1], outCoords[9][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[10][1], outCoords[10][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[11][1], outCoords[11][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[12][1], outCoords[12][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[13][1], outCoords[13][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[14][1], outCoords[14][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[15][1], outCoords[15][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[16][1], outCoords[16][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[17][1], outCoords[17][2], unID: unID=unID+1 !! HOTSPOT2 outCoords[18][1], outCoords[18][2], unID: unID=unID+1 !! HOTSPOT2 outCoords[19][1], outCoords[19][2], unID: unID=unID+1 !! HOTSPOT2 outCoords[20][1], outCoords[20][2], unID: unID=unID+1 !! HOTSPOT2 outCoords[21][1], outCoords[21][2], unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[5][1], outCoords[5][2], hceID_1
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ENDIF
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
type_symb = 1 success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN res = 24 IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 9 IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN res = 12
EPS = 0.0001
edgeThick = 0.003
prismHalfWidth = ConWidth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1+frameWidth prismHalfHeight = ConDepth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1+frameWidth
prismInsideHalfWidth = ConWidth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1 prismInsideHalfHeight = ConDepth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConLength_1" THEN B = ConLength_1 PARAMETERS B = B ENDIF IF ABS(ConLength_1 - B) > EPS THEN ConLength_1 = B PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = ConLength_1 ENDIF
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
! --- dirAngOnXYPlane of the route --- !
IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN arCosVal = MEP_Position[3][1]/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal)-90 IF SGN(MEP_Position[3][2]) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 180-dirAngOnXYPlane ENDIF
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1+gs_Connections[1][4]*ConLength_1, ConPosY_1+gs_Connections[1][5]*ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+gs_Connections[1][6]*ConLength_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT 0, 0, ConPosZ_1 PUT 0, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1
PUT prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight PUT -prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight PUT -prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight PUT prismHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight
!!PUT prismHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight !!PUT -prismHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+prismHalfHeight !!PUT -prismHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight !!PUT prismHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1-prismHalfHeight
PUT prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight PUT -prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight PUT -prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight PUT prismInsideHalfWidth, 0, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight
PUT prismInsideHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight PUT -prismInsideHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+prismInsideHalfHeight PUT -prismInsideHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight PUT prismInsideHalfWidth, ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1-prismInsideHalfHeight
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[30][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[30][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1]+MEP_Position[1][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2]+MEP_Position[1][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3]+MEP_Position[1][3] NEXT cnum
z = MEP_Position[1][3]
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Extruded Louver
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[5][4] FOR i = 1 TO 5 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[1] ui_con_type[1] = 0
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "2dmacro" parameters all, type_symb = type_symb ! Extruded Louver
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 0 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "MainBoxMaterial" IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 1
! --- THE ONLY CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Конца Воздуховода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "B" RANGE [0,]
PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConDepth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1
VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0, ]
PARAMETERS A = ConWidth_1+frameWidth*2+ConWallThickness_1*2 PARAMETERS ZZYZX = ConDepth_1+frameWidth*2+ConWallThickness_1*2 LOCK "A", "ZZYZX" ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF SetProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
